steps.name: greeting
steps.instruction: Greet the passenger professionally and welcome them to the airline check-in counter. Ask for their flight information and identification.
steps.completion_criteria: Passenger provides their flight details and identification

steps.name: verification
steps.instruction: Verify the passenger's flight details, check their identification, and confirm their booking in the system.
steps.completion_criteria: Passenger's booking is verified and confirmed

steps.name: baggage
steps.instruction: Ask about checked baggage, weigh the luggage, and inform the passenger of any baggage fees or restrictions.
steps.completion_criteria: Baggage is processed and any fees are communicated

steps.name: seat_assignment
steps.instruction: Confirm or assign seats, inform the passenger about their seat location, and ask if they have any special needs.
steps.completion_criteria: Seat assignment is confirmed and special needs are addressed

steps.name: boarding_pass
steps.instruction: Issue the boarding pass, provide information about the gate number and boarding time, and wish the passenger a pleasant flight.
steps.completion_criteria: Boarding pass is issued and all flight information is provided
